1.content: Here you can choose a few characters below to start with. Try to keep the characters as weight gains, but there will be a few other selections to do whatever you want.
1.title: Just the Beginning

111.content: How does King Julian get heavier?
111.title: Weight gain

choices: He gets force fed (In whatever way you like)
He willingly gains weight (Again, in whatever way you like)
1111.content: Excellent choice. Now then, how will he gain weight?
1111.title: He gets fatter.

choices: he gets kidnapped by a human
11111.title: He gets force fed (In whatever way you like)

choices: praise him and trick him into coming with her willingly
111112.content:
it was a still night and a well known thief was on the loose. as the police cars chased her, she took a sharp left and leapt into the Zoo's grounds. hiding by the walls she waited for the night to fall silent. as it did she decided to walk around and admire the animals, being a massive criminal she doesnt really get the chance to come here often. as she wondered through the dark park she noticed how all the animals seemed to be in their cliched personalities
except one
the ring tailed lemur.
sh noticed how instead of the somewhat social and docile as most she studied in her younger years, this one seemed more prideful and energetic.
even wearing a little crown.
she knew from personal experience those who were prideful were bossy and one-minded.
smirking as she put her fingers on her chin and plotted.

what does she do?
111112.title: he gets kidnapped by a human

1111121.content:
deciding it would be best to sedate the prideful mammal, she waited till the animals were asleep and crept to the enclosure. as she approached the sleeping animal, the small one woke (mort) and was about to cry out when she smiled and offered him a mango, he gushed and dug into the fruit before passing out again.
she produced a small needle and injected Julian with it.
he jolted slightly then stilled. she picked up the animal and slunk out of the zoo.

none of the occupants any wiser and the cameras didnt catch anything either.

what happens next?
1111121.title: sedate julian

choices: Tie him down to a small chair and feed him
Hypnotize him and make him gain weight
11111211.content:
Julian slowly awakens to find himself in a dimly lit room, in a custom built cage. He trys to get up and run towards the bars of the cage, but finds great difficulty in doing so, as the sedative has yet to fully wear off, leading to him slumping over on to his back and breathing heavily.

He then turns over and starts to crawl over to the door of the cage, rattling it in vain hope of it opening. Just as he pulls himself up into a standing position, the door of the room starts to open. Just before it opens, Julian lies down and pretends to be asleep, in hope that it would trick anyone who came through.

The door opens, revealing the thief as she walks over to the cage and looks over Julian. After a good few seconds of looking at him, she smirks and walks over to a table on the farside of the room, quietly setting up a plan on how to handle Juliain.

How will she do it?
11111211.title: when julian wakes up

111112113.content: Does she gain his trust before stuffing him?

12.content: how does Private become a fatty
12.title: Private

choices: Making a wish and having it granted by magic.
121.content:
Private, the penguin, had always wanted to be fat.
So he gets his wish by....
121.title: he's always wanted to be fat

choices: the rat starts feeding him and rubbing his belly
1211.content:
as the penguins strolled through central park that night in their routine patrol, private saw something in one of the many alleyways. silently breaking from the trio he went to investigate. as he got closer though he saw a rather obese rat. the brown creature was sitting on its flabby hind legs as it massive gut filled most of the space in front of it. private's eyes went wide "hello friend" he said, the rat looked at him and its fat face grew to a smirk "hello penguin" private smiled and said "what are you eating?" the rat only shut his eyes in pleasure as he swallowed his most recent bite. as he moaned from the pleasure he replied "i'm not sure but i know its what the humans eat. its damn good though"

private was slightly curious so asked "may i have some?" the rat looked him up and down "are you sure little penguin?" he only nodded his reply and the rat smirked "well i suppose you can have what's over there, i'm to lazy to move from my hoard here" Private's eyes lit up as he walked past the large rodent. even in the dim light private could see the glory in front of him.

half empty drinks and flavoured chips, popcorn, burgers and hotdogs, chips, chocolate. it was glorious. as he picked up the first greasy burger he licked his beak and bit into it. almost instantly his mouth filled with the most incredible flavours he'd ever tasted. he wasted no time in taking another bite then finishing it. licking the grease and sauce off his beak he grabbed a drink and slurped down the melted chocolate milkshake. the drink resting in his somewhat full stomach. he reached forward and grabbed some fries in one and some chips in the other, shoving them both in his mouth and down his gullet. adding to the pressure in his stomach.

as he continued to eat the rat looked in interest at the hungry penguin as he knead his overstuffed gut as much as he could. he watched as private subconsciously rubbed his gut before he let out a little burp. he stopped at this point and massaged his gut tenderly, never being this full before in his life.

what does he do?
1211.title: late night feast

choices: he makes it back to the bunker unnoticed
12111.content:
looking at the food in front of him as he stroked his firm belly, he shrugged "no use in wasting good food, dont you think rat?" he asked looking back to see the engorged rat rubbing his large gut "y *belch* yea, come on kid, you can finish it. i believe in you" private nodded and picked up the three bars of chocolate, due to the shade they were still pretty firm. private smashed through the chocolate and grabbed the burgers that were left, sitting down as he greedily ate them. the fullness he was feeling becoming more apparent with every item he ate, but he couldnt resist the flavour.

while the rat looked on, all you could hear from private was slurping, chewing, moaning, licked his beak and the occasional full groan. by the time he'd finished his 'meal' he was leaning against the wall, both flippers on his stuffed gut. as he tried to calm his stomach, the rat came slowly over with his heavily distended gut dragging lightly on the ground in front of him. private looked at the rodent who smiled "hey was that for a feed?" he crooned at the stuffed bird. he looked down and said "that was amazing" they were in agreement.

private looked towards the entrance and said "i have to go back now, it was nice meeting you rat" the stuffed rodent nodded "likewise penguin"

what happens next?
12111.title: private, the stuffed penguin

1243.content: Private stood there, looking himself over in the mirror. he now stood five feet tall and ten or so feet wide. "oh my, I've really let myself go." Private said as he squeezed his big fat belly.

12431.content: "Actually, I kind of like it." Private said as he continued to play with his belly. "However, I'm nowhere near fat enough, I need to be fatter." Private said as he began to search for more food.

124312.content: After a month of fattening, Private was now too big to leave the bunker. His belly had spread out on the floor, his rump now acted as a cushion, he was even having trouble walking, and he loved every minute of it.

1243121.content:
While Private may have liked being fat, his friends thought he was too big. They couldn't go on missions when he can't leave the bunker!
"Okay," said Skipper while Private was asleep. "We must get Private back to his regular size".
The others agreed but how do they do it?
1243121.title: continue

13111.content:
Mort fell asleep and dreamt about eating all his favourite foods.

But before we continue, we must ask some key questions.
1. I know it's a bit of a sketchy rule, but Rule Three means it needs to be kid friendly and the word "vore" is basically an adult way of saying cannibalism. Not to mention the fact that fattening them up was meant to be a joke, judging by the "E" rating and the fact that it's comedy.
2. He ate Julien. Is death allowed?
3. It's meant to be in-character. Is Mort the sort who'd eat the king?

So, before Mort wakes up, please answer this question.
13111.title: he dream eating all types of foods

choices: he went to the food count

when his dragging the bowling ball of flab around he at the need the eat something very-very badly and some how the sleeping mort ended up in the penguin habitat as he look for so he had see the penguins had food now in his

dreams the penguins looked like the best fruit ever MANGOS!! cry-ed mort as he began to take and eat all the mangos in his seeing rang he started to attack the biggest fruit there


the fruit had tryed to run away pining them whit his belly he gobble up all the fruit and saw how they where moving in his belly it filled so goooooooood as he wake up from his dream mort belly wit the penguins moving in all was the size of the beach ball as he draged beach ball belly he went to the food storage and attacked the storage he was eating all of it (and I ment he left nothing unthouch) he had left whit his growing belly to the fountain to drink it all

131121.content: as we see the not so little lemur as he on the look out for more food he saw kangaroo would be nice of cross he made some stops along the way on his 21th meal it seemed that some thing was off way OFF no-one had tried to stop and if they did he could pin them with his be belly could that because he at eat-in like all zoo but the Reptile house oh well mort say-ed as he was dragging the TV size belly to the Reptile House to end his zoo meal taking chameleons by storm eating snakes like noddles and a poison frog then went to joey and ate him to! soon mort went to leave the zoo with his AIRPLANE size belly he went to the city for some more

1312.content:
Mort was happily walking around his habitat trying to kill some time. It wasn't long before he saw the greatest sight of his life: A giant pile of mangoes!

"MANGO!" Mort shouted. He couldn't believe it. Mangoes have always been his favorite food, dating back to his time in Madagascar. He climbed up onto their habitat to get a few mangoes to eat, though it wasn't going to be easy. As soon as Mort reached for a mango, Julien was right there to stop him.

"Eh...what are you doing Mort?" Julien asked.

"Getting a mango." Mort said sheepishly.

"Silly Mort. Those mangoes are for the king. So...none for you."

"But...I want a mango."

"Thems the breaks. Now run along. I think I'm going to enjoy some mangoes." Mort left feeling a little bothered by his encounter with Julien so he left the area with his head hung low. But then he had an idea. I wonderful idea in fact.

So...what's Mort's idea?
1312.title: Overeating

choices: he went to the zoo storage

I well go start for I am the king as julien started shaking the money maker as that was going on mort went by and started eating all the mangos went he has done belly was bloated form all the mangos then hop away to find more mangos

13211.content:
As Max woke up, he saw that he was in a very big room, with a ton of gelatin that was piled as high as the walls around him. At first Mas was wondering where he was, but then he heard a disembodied voice.

"Hi kitty! I want a new cat, but I don't want any cat, I want a cat that is capable of eating anything I give it. If you don't eat, it's 'bye-bye kitty'." Max thought she was crazy, but he did like gelatin, plus he didn't want to die so he started to slurp some of the gelatin. His stomach alreadying bloating from the gelatin and he wasn't even half done. It began to look like he had eaten a bowling ball as Max continued stuffing hmself. When he was 3/4 of the way done, his belly was drooping heavily and he had to addle to get to the rest. When he wad done, he had a giggly watermelon sized stomach that was touching the floor, groaning with all the gelatin.

As Max heard the sound of a door opening, a girl came out and put a hose in his butt and put max on the floor.

"Hold on kitty, you must be thirsty with all that gelatin." As she turned the handle, water started to flood Max's stomach, making it bloat. As he cried in pleasure, his belly began to push him up into the air. The girl came and picked him up, taking the hose out. Max looked around seeing this was the home of the richest family in New York. Max looked at his stomach and there was no fat, only water, and he didn't have to pee. If some one looked at him, they would see a cat who's stomach was touching the ground, full of a mix of water and gelatin.

As the weeks went by, Max was getting fatter on his new diet. At this point, Max had a stomach the size of a TV and six moobs ont he side. As he was waddling around, he ended up in...
13211.title: pet-max -WG

132112.content:
as he entered the room, he looked arund and saw he was in the kitchen. he's massive belly dragged slightly as he slowly waddled into the dimly lit room. as he scanned the room he noticed the food laid out on the counter and licked his lips. sitting on his flabby hind legs as he belly swelled out in front of him, yearning for the food. he knead the squishy flab as he thought back to a time he was only a kitty of bones. chuckling to himself as he tried to jump up, only to have his stomach drag him down and his energy with it. he knew the human girl who took him in was out so shrieked in protest to starving. soon after another female human dashed into the kitchen and her eyes landed on the fat cat. sighing lowly she walked over to him and pet his soft head, "my sister's done a number on you hasnt she kitty?"
he purred at her touch as her hand travelled down to his large but empty stomach. she gently knead his flab as he had and he felt his flab jiggle as it roared with hunger.
the girl only smiled "you hungry kitty" he meowed loudly in response and looked at the food spread out.
she followed his gaze and then looked back at him before saying "you sure?"
she felt his growling stomach in her hands and...
132112.title: he was in the kitchen

1321122.content:
she wrapped her arms around all his flab and groaned as she struggled to pick him up. carrying him over to a special chair. as she placed him down he fit near perfectly in the feeding seat. she brought the portable table to him with the massive turkey placed on it. Max's mouth salivated and his flab visably jiggle.
she knead his abundant stomach and scratched his triple chin "such a hungry kitty, arent we?"
he meowed loudly and she chuckled "ok, here you go." she put the roast bird slightly away from him so he'd have to lean over to gorge. as he did so she could almost see his stomach grow with every bite.
he was an eating machine. within ten minutes the fattest turkey was no more than bones. very clean bones.
she knead his grown stomach to find it only slightly hard "such a big appetite kitty, would you like some more?" Max was more than willing to oblidge.
the girl wanting to test his boundries decided to save the main course till after dessert.
she reached into the fridge and pulled out a massive eight layered cream frosted ice cream cake.

max saw the treat and licked his seasoned lips and his stomach gurgled. as she placed it down, she pulled out a massive dessert spoon and scooped some up.
holding out the spoon Max ate the contents before he purred in pleasure. she filled the spoon up again and continued to feed him. one hand on his blubbery belly as she fed spoonful after spoonful of the rich cream and calories into the large feline. he would purr and meow in pleasure.
1321122.title: smiled "you are hungry arent you"

1411.content:
King julien was sulking. "This throne is boring... MAURICE! You stupid Aye-aye! get your furry butt over here!"

Maurice had just woken up from a nap. "Your majesty?" he said tired. "MAURICE! I NEED YOUR HELP!" "what now sir..." I need a new throne!"

Maurice just shook his head and went back to sleep.

"Maurice.... pfft... never let an overweight aye-aye do a king's job." After some thinking. He remembered the party back at Madagascar with the 4 new york giants. "Gloria, was a fun one indeed..." he thought. "But what made her so....round...jiggly.... soft....hmmm..." He then remembered Maurice, he was similar, and he was fat. "That's it! i must find a fat animal! But i dont want a guy.... ehihih! *shivers* i must have a female to be my new throne..." He then saw Marline go by. "Yes... That's my new throne! The otter!" he rubbed his hands together and then thought how he was going to make her huge. In the distance, he saw the penguins.
1411.title: Marlene on the king's mind

14113.content:
" That's it!" he said. "I'll invite Marlene over to a feats, then feed her too much food! Is that not the greatest idea you have ever heard?" questioned Julien.
" It's wonderful, your majesty," replied Maurice.
Julien ran over to Marlene
" Oh, hi Marlene! I was wondering, would you like to come over to my feast tomorrow night?" asked Julien.
" Uh, okay, I guess," she replied.
" Great! I will be seeing you there!" yelled Julien. Julien walked casually back to his habitat, grinning and giggling.

14121.content: Rhonda the walrus had been tired of all the small toys at the zoo, she could easily crush anything the zoo keeper could give her to play with, but marlene was too small for her to play with. So Rhonda had a plan to fatten marlene to her size to be able to play with her. So while marlene slept Rhonda slipped some fattening pills into some of the fish, after an hour some of the fish had a pill inside of they. As morning came Marlene woke up hungry so she quickly ran to eat before Rhonda woke to eat all the fish. Marlene was never the wiser to Rhonda's plan. An hour later the fattening pills took affect on Marlene while she was swimming she noticed that she was swimming a little harder but was not sure why. A couple of hours later Marlene was three times her size and weight. But she was wondering how did she gain weight she was normally unable to eat since Rhonda moved in. Later that night Marlene went to bed she thought that she was sleep eating so she ask Rhonda to block the cave entrance and she said yes, but Rhonda was really gonna add more fattening pills to the fish and force feed marlene while she slept. Marlene was a heavy sleeper, Rhonda could do anything and Marlene never woke. The next day Marlene was even fatter she was just barley able to leave the cave. Rhonda was pleased with the results of her work. Later as time went on Marlene had fattened up to the weight and size of Rhonda.  The next day Rhonda's plan was complete she had something to play with that was big enough for her.

info.brief_description: A little idea of fattening up chracters from the Nickelodeon show Penguins of Madagascar.!
info.description:
A story where YOU can make one of the characters of the Penguins of Madagascar fatter. Or any other thing. There will be a few selections where any plotline can go. Please add on to the story, this being my first idea. I know this won't get many views but we will see. Here are a few rules.

1.NO GAY PLOTLINES

2.There is no limit to anything you can do to the characters.

3.Please keep it kid friendly and limit the bad words.

4.Try to keep the characters in character.

The 3rd and 4th rule I don't care too much, but whatever you do, listen to rule one.
info.pretty_title: Penguins of Madagascar Weight Gain Story
